Package arcade.patch.agent.process

Class PatchProcessMetabolismSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.agent.process.PatchProcess
      • arcade.patch.agent.process.PatchProcessMetabolism
        • arcade.patch.agent.process.PatchProcessMetabolismSimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Process
    public class PatchProcessMetabolismSimple
extends PatchProcessMetabolism
    Extension of PatchProcessMetabolism for simple metabolism.

    PatchProcessMetabolismSimple assumes a constant glucose uptake rate and constant ATP production rate. Ratio of ATP production that needs to be produced through glycolysis or oxidative phosphorylation is controlled by the METABOLIC_PREFERENCE parameter.

    PatchProcessMetabolismSimple will increase cell mass (using specified fraction of internal glucose) if cell is dividing and less than double in size.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatchProcessMetabolismSimple

        public PatchProcessMetabolismSimple​(PatchCell cell)
        Creates a simple metabolism Process for the given PatchCell.

        Module only has internal glucose.

        Loaded parameters include:

        • CELL_VOLUME = cell volume
        • METABOLIC_PREFERENCE = preference for glycolysis over oxidative phosphorylation
        • CONSTANT_GLUCOSE_UPTAKE_RATE = constant glucose uptake rate
        • CONSTANT_ATP_PRODUCTION_RATE = constant ATP production rate
        • CONSTANT_VOLUME_GROWTH_RATE = constant volume growth rate
        Parameters:
        cell - the PatchCell the process is associated with
